extendedInfo.description: Calcbuddy Calculator is an easy to use scientific calculator.CalcBuddy is now also available for iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch.The calculator features:* See entire expression on screen* Instant as-you-type calculation* 15 functions: trig, log, +more* Radians or Degrees* 30 scientific constants* Full operation & result history* View answer as fraction* Digit grouping of result* Storage between sessions* 9 different skins to choose from* Built-in help chapter & links to more info onlineThis app is intended as a handy multi-purpose calculator. For a basic calculator, all you need is on the Standard tab, and for a scientific calculator you've got the Functions and Constants. Many of the constants can be very helpful in physics and chemistry calculations.NOTE: If sin, cos, tan or their inverse functions don't give the expected answer, make sure you have selected the correct angle mode. You switch between radians and degrees in Menu -> Settings.

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Excelent calcualtor app and  good layout. A multi-line display might be nice but this one works very well. Best calcualtor app I\'ve found.
reviews.author: Jeff Sloop

reviews.title: Simple and user friendly.
reviews.comment: Nice simple calculator that makes sense and gets the job done. I am very satisfied.
reviews.author: Anna Sanchez-Newby

reviews.title: Recommended
reviews.comment: I use this feature rich app all day at work and highly recommend it. Dev responded to support mail fast and updates keep coming regulary. Thanks :)  They recently fixed the ics keyboard issue which is fantastic... Cheers!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great & simple
reviews.comment: As-you-type results, quick, accurate Calculator. I\'ve used this for years.
reviews.author: Carl F. Cascaddan

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Wonderful app. If you add percent on it, this app will be perfect, I will give 5 stars. Thanks
reviews.author: Diep Hoac

reviews.title: Impressive!
reviews.comment: Love the flexible history--allows you to re-use both the steps & answer to calculations, and you can copy the displayed steps to the clipboard. The E key simplifies exponential calcs. Is my go-to calculator.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best yet
reviews.comment: Tried many. This has the best skins and interface - the \"aurora\" skin is wild in that it changes every time you switch back to it. You don\'t have to press \"=\" to get the result as you go, and you can see/edit the equation in the line above.
reviews.author: K Arakis

reviews.comment: Simple and straightforward. Easy to use. Large keys enables easy inputs. Would recommend. Best one I have used so far.
reviews.author: Marvin Thompson

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: No permissions required. Not like some calculators.  Hehe.  Thanks for the app.
reviews.author: Elizabeth Yessiladafty

reviews.title: Exemplary!
reviews.comment: I tried a number of calc apps, and for me this is the best all-round regular calc and the best replacement for stock. Its clear UI is the best, and I for one find the history extremely useful. The functions available are more than enough for most work. And the price is awesome!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can be good but
reviews.comment: When I subtract fractions eg 1.3202 - 1.32 i get = 2E-4. ..dont like this.. I want simple .0002 answer. there are no settings to adjust this.  And the E ,^, fraction buttons should be customiseable with +/- , % and other operators.  Also after pressing \'enter\' eg after 9+7. the C button gets disabled. I just dont want to clear the input feild but also the output feild at times. not a big issue but annoying.  that said the interface is sold and this is a good one. more themes would b great. Thanks for this..
reviews.author: A Malik

reviews.title: The best
reviews.comment: Simple, no ads and does the job, no need to carry those clunky casio alternatives anymore. If you\'re using any other app, you\'re cheating yourself.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Very nice and clean No adds
reviews.author: Dennis Pearson

reviews.title: Favorite !
reviews.comment: This is my favorite. Calculator cause I have tried all calculators this is the best in Google play .   Must have app . I will never uninstall it    !
reviews.author: Deepak Arora

reviews.title: Best
reviews.comment: This is my favorite calculation app. Read the help section and you might like the app even more. A lot of hard work was put into this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: BRILLIANT APP REALLY!!!
reviews.comment: It is easy to use and give long  calculations result in short piece of time.  And does all type of calc which you need in a calculator.@@@$\342\202\254\302\243\302\245\302\242
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Easy to use, and feature rich
reviews.comment: Comprehensive calculator that can be as basic as you want, or as complex to solve the most demanding maths problems.
reviews.author: Pratik Das Gupta

reviews.title: Best 3D KeyPad
reviews.comment: CalcBuddy\'s Default Skin has the most Realistic Looking Graphic User Interface, (GUI), but it lacks the Plus/Minus Change Sign, & the Percent Button, and a Separate Tape History Button, and bigger Text Size on the History would be more Readable. If CalcBuddy had a LandScape Mode, & put some Blue Color on the KeyPad and Color on the History Tape History, this would be a keeper. For an Expressions Calculator, I like the RDEV Calculator Better.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: good scientific calculator
reviews.comment: easier to use than a typical scientific calculator
reviews.author: Kenneth Zou

reviews.title: Best calculator ever
reviews.comment: Solid, reliable, easy to use. The instant results (without having to type =) is so convenient.
reviews.author: David Andrews
